title: Simon Institute for Long-Term Governance
missionStatement: SI's mission is to increase the capacity of policy networks to mitigate global catastrophic risks and build resilience for civilization to flourish.
keyQuestions: What does the prior distribution of success for new longermist organizations look like?
When will we have a better estimate of the Simon Institute for Long-Term Governance's input?
Is funding SILG better than OpenPhilanthropy's last longtermist dollar?
